name: Fragomen
content: Pulse, a Neudesic Product makes employee communication and collaboration easier than ever. Share ideas, projects, files, feedback, and receive instant answers – anywhere, anytime. This project adds a new feature to pulse called TPM (Talent Performance management) which enables the Performance Appraisal cycle go online. TPM includes various processes like gathering feedback from clients, managers, scrum masters etc. and rating them based on their performance.
activities: Shailender worked as a Design Technologist and a front end engineer where he exhibited superb User Experience Skills. He had to change the Styles of complicated and pre-existing designs.

He has implemented the animated charts and data visualization utilizing the open source called D3.Js and C3.Js. He also implemented the US maps locating the all the Geo-Locations of all Neudesic Offices accurately.
He has performed the UI testing in all major browsers supporting IE-9, 10 and 11.
ools: Visual Studio, ASP.NET MVC4, HTML 5, CSS 3, LessCss, HighCharts, Kendo UI, JQuery, JavaScript, and other Third Party Plugins.

name: Pulse-Talent Performance Management
content: Pulse, a Neudesic Product makes employee communication and collaboration easier than ever. Share ideas, projects, files, feedback, and receive instant answers – anywhere, anytime. This project adds a new feature to pulse called TPM (Talent Performance management) which enables the Performance Appraisal cycle go online. TPM includes various processes like gathering feedback from clients, managers, scrum masters etc. and rating them based on their performance.
activities: Shailender worked as a Design Technologist and a front end engineer where he exhibited superb User Experience Skills. He had to change the Styles of complicated and pre-existing designs.

He has implemented the animated charts and data visualization utilizing the open source called D3.Js and C3.Js. He also implemented the US maps locating the all the Geo-Locations of all Neudesic Offices accurately.
He has performed the UI testing in all major browsers supporting IE-9, 10 and 11.
tools: Visual Studio 2012, Visual Studio 2013, WINLESS – Compiler, Photoshop-CS6, SQL Management studio 2008 R2,  HTML5, CSS3, D3.js, C3.js, JavaScript, AJAX, JQuery, JSON, Angular.JS, Kendo UI, Bootstrap, JSP, LESS, SASS, Knockout.js, and Handlebar.js.

name: Prince Resorts Hawaii – CRM Responsive Web Application
role: UX Designer and Front End Developer
content: Group of reputed hotels in Hawaii renowned hospitality which allows customers to plan their vacation in Hawaii using their portal which enables the user to opt for holiday packages and SPA services using their membership programs.
activities: Worked as a Designer and Developer in this project and created the interactive UI for the web application which can viewed on multiple screen resolution (RESPONSIVE DESIGN).
Coordinated with the developers and client to ensure that the Client is satisfied and design philosophy is intact.
Performed the UI testing in all types of devices varying from iPhone, iPad, Windows Phone, Surface Tablets and other android based devices to ensure that the final deployment is best.
tools: Visual Studio 2012, WINLESS- compiler, Photoshop-CS5, HTML5, CSS3, D3.js, C3.js, JavaScript, AJAX, JQuery, JSON, Kendo UI, Bootstrap, Less.

name: Weichert Realtors- Windows App
content: A family of full-service real estate and financial services companies serving key markets throughout the U.S which is one of the most visited real estate websites in the nation, offering quick and easy access to listing information, Streamlining the delivery of mortgages, home and title insurance.
activities: Initated project from Scratch and created the interactive UI for the Windows 8 Screens by implementing all the functional API’s applicable for Microsoft Surface.
Worked with business analysts to understand their business models and goals and help define strategy, content, and features.
Exhibited UI and UX skills in understanding products, industry and related technologies comparing it to clients existing application and modifying accordingly.
Coordinated with the developers and Stakeholders to ensure that the Modern Windows 8 design philosophy is intact and that it aligns with the visual design
tools: Visual Studio 2012, Photoshop-CS5, WINLESS- comp, WinJs, HTML 5, CSS 3, LessCss, JQuery, JavaScript, and other Third Party Plugins.

name: Infante Angeles
content: Infante Angeles is law firm located in the busiest city of Peru. This site was meant to create Law firms Online Identity and also to attract more customers. This Site is Oriented to the achievement of objectives through development of strategies, formation of high performance teams and implementation of action plans. Demonstrates results through leadership skills, analysis and problem solving; And teamwork. Inter-functional management capabilities to provide a global solution due to multidisciplinary studies and multicultural experience.
activities: Built User interfaces that allow Users to get the details of the Law practices in the Law Firm.
Built User interfaces that can be used by Users to search for attorney and enquire about them.
The entire application was implemented with direct communication with Client.
tools: Photoshop, Dreamweaver, Visual Studio 2012, HTML5, CSS3, SASS, Java Script and JQuery.

name: Yukon PLC
content: The foundation of Yukon is passionate about learning, giving back, and always proudly and actively striving to do what is right for the client. They enjoy each other’s company and value honesty and transparency.
activities: Designed User interfaces that allow Users to get the details of the various practices in the company.
Developed User interfaces that can be used by Users to search for projects and enquire about them.
The entire application was implemented with Web Forms, HTML5, CSS3, Java Script and JQuery.
tools: Photoshop, Dreamweaver, Visual Studio 2012, HTML5, CSS3, SASS, Java Script and JQuery.

name: Word & Brown –Florida Healthcare
content: The Word & Brown Companies are the nation’s recognized leader in developing and offering cutting-edge technology and quality health and other insurance plans and employee benefits to individuals, families, and groups of all sizes.
activities: Worked as a Design Technologist in this project and had created the front end UI for the screens which were the part of Healthcareportal
Coordinated with the developers, Stakeholders and Visual Designers  to ensure that the design philosophy is intact and that it aligns with the visual design.
Involvement in all stages of Software development life cycle including Analysis, development, Implementation, testing and support.
Exhibited skills in product understanding, industry and related technologies comparing it to clients existing application and modifying accordingly.

images.title: Entrollment Qualify Page
images.caption: User can be able to check his qualification for enrollment

tools: Visual Studio, ASP.NET MVC4, HTML 5, CSS 3, LessCss, HighCharts, Kendo UI, JQuery, JavaScript, and other Third Party Plugins.
